name: Awesome Poker - Texas Holdem
description:
Say 'No More' to single-player poker games!! The most powerful mobile poker game ever!
Meet and challenge the most skilled poker players in the world in exciting match-ups!
Delve into the world of classic poker, just a touch away! Play whenever, and wherever you want.

THE choice for VIP poker enthusiasts! “Awesome Poker!”

*Texas Hold'em Poker, king of all card games, unfolding in your hands.
- Quick match-ups with skilled poker users from around the world.
- High-definition graphics for a more immersive and comprehensive gaming experience.
- The true fun of actual Las Vegas casino-style classic poker rules. Put your skills, nerves and pride to the test.
*Folding is just another strategy. Sit & Go!!
- A completely different game from Hold’em! Come out on top of the endless mind games and psychological warfare unfolding among 5 professional poker players!
- Cash $10,000? $100,000? None of that matters. Everybody starts on a level playing field. What you do from there is up to you...
- The best doesn't necessarily win: whoever survives the longest is the victor. Keep taking up the challenge until you become to true master of the poker world.

* Full network support! Enjoy in all online environments, both 3G & Wi-Fi!
'Awesome Poker' provides full network support, for both 3G and Wi-Fi. Enjoy online poker with other users anywhere, and anytime you want!

* Completely free! Great new events and bonuses daily!
Daily bonuses for all users who log in! Half-price sales on chip packs, along with numerous other benefits and events, await you in Awesome Poker!

Don't hesitate. The moment you hesitate - that is the moment you lose.
